snippet: Newcastle United midfielder Jonjo Shelvey has been banned for five matches and fined 100,000 pounds for racially abusing an opponent, the English FA said on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Newcastle United midfielder Jonjo Shelvey has been banned for five matches and fined 100,000 pounds for racially abusing an opponent, the English FA said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Newcastle's Shelvey Handed Five-Match Ban for Racial Abuse
headline.print_headline: Newcastle's Shelvey Handed Five-Match Ban for Racial Abuse
